kernel.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the part of a nut or seed inside the shell, or the part inside the stone of some fruits
kernel.translation[0].definitions[1].def: one of the small yellow pieces on a corn cob
kernel.translation[0].definitions[2].def: the most important part of a statement, idea, plan etc
kernel.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: This evidence is the kernel of the defendantsâ€™ case.
kernel.translation[0].definitions[3].def: a very small part or amount of something
kernel.translation[0].definitions[3].exa: There may be a kernel of truth in what he says.
